Description.Text: Central Park is a stylish 4-star superior hotel offering chic accommodation in the heart of Baku. Highlights include a sauna, gym, rooftop restaurant, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to Nizami Promenade. The Old Town is the historic centre of Baku and has been recognised as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Nearby places of interest include Maiden Tower, Shirvanshah's Palace and Juma mosque. Old City Railway station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Baku destinations. The hotel occupies an attractive mid-rise property with a sweeping external stairwell. Facilities include a sauna and gym. A range of massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a bright, contemporary style with dark wood furniture and beautiful artworks. Amenities include tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen satellite TV and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The Maccaroni rooftop restaurant offers traditional international dishes with a modern twist in a sophisticated and intimate setting, while guests can enjoy a range of cocktails and snacks at the stylish Sky bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
